item.description:
Join us for dinner and drinks at the new CBS Scene Restaurant & Bar at Patriot Place in Foxborough. This will be a fun new place to check out!

Visit CBS Scene Restaurant & Bar for a dining and entertainment experience unlike any other. Dining options feature upscale American cuisine freshly prepared from scratch. The entire restaurant is fully HD and features 137 state-of-the-art graphic projector displays so you can watch the game or classic CBS programming on your table-top television. Relax at the expansive bar with a cocktail, craft beer or wine by the glass and check out the game on a 360 square foot projection wall or dine outdoors on the terrace as you overlook Gillette Stadium. CBS Scene Restaurant & Bar showcases the 75-year history of the CBS network through cutting edge technology, design and decor, and incredible cuisine. Don't miss it!

Everyone pays for their own food/drinks. We will meet in the bar area, then have dinner.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) in bar area. call 774 232 0000 if you need to.
item.name: Dinner and Drinks at new CBS Scene Restaurant and Bar at Patriot Place
